tda_supervised_ensemble.root_cause: Feature extraction differences (217 vs 80 dimensions), different sequence sampling
tda_supervised_ensemble.notes: Significant performance inflation detected, claim invalid

temporal_persistence_evolution.notes: Evolution-based features performed worse than baseline

multiscale_tda_synthetic.root_cause: Synthetic data too simple, not representative of real complexity
multiscale_tda_synthetic.notes: Perfect performance on synthetic data invalidates real-data claim

data_complexity_dependency.discovery: APT detector performance highly sensitive to data complexity

simple_synthetic.result: Improved detector fails on simple data

complex_synthetic.result: Improved detector excels on complex data

real_data_cicids2017.result: Validated performance on real infiltration attacks

data_complexity_dependency.implication: All performance claims must specify data generation method and complexity

multiscale_temporal_tda.notes: Core breakthrough claim needs independent validation

validation_summary.next_priority: Create standardized validation protocol for real data
